Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12)
Combat Notes:

Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)

Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Bloodline Resistance: +1 vs. spells and magical effects
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic

Magic Notes:
Aberrant: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Tentacular Limbs spell
Advanced Bloodline: Knows Drain Life spell/+1 Focus Points
Angelic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Angelic Halo spell
Bloodline Paragon: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Bloodline Perfection: +1 10th level spell slot
Bloodline: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Demonic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Glutton's Jaws spell
Diabolic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Diabolic Edict spell
Divine Evolution: +1 D9 slot for Heal or Harm
Draconic: Spell Trained (Arcane))/Knows the Dragon Claws spell
Elemental: Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows the Elemental Toss spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Fey: Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows the Faerie Dust spell
Greater Bloodline: Knows Grasping Grave spell/+1 Focus Points
Hag: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows the Jealous Hex spell
Imperial: Spell Trained (Arcane)/Knows the Ancestral Memories spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal)
Primal Evolution: +1 P9 slot for Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus
Undead: Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows the Undeath's Blessing spell
Aberrant: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +2 Will saves for 1 rd
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a different tradition
Angelic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 saves for 1 rd
Arcane Evolution: May learn 1 additional spell from spellbook each day, treating it as a signature spell if it is in repertoire
Bespell Weapon: (F) May cast a non-cantrip spell to also cause a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until end of turn; damage type depends on spell school
Bloodline Conduit: (1) May cast instantaneous spells of 5th level and lower without expending a spell slot
Bloodline Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Bloodline Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Counterspell: (R) May expend a spell slot to counteract a spell with the same spell
Crossblooded Evolution: May have 1 spell from a different tradition in repertoire
Dangerous Sorcery: Casting an instantaneous harmful spell inflicts additional damage equal to its level
Demonic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts -1 AC on target for 1 rd
Diabolic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Deception for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell level
Draconic: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 AC for 1 rd
Effortless Concentration: (F) May extend the duration of 1 spell
Elemental: Casting a bloodline spell gives self +1 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning or fire per spell level on target for 1 rd
Fey: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target concealment for 1 rd
Greater Crossblooded Evolution: May know 3 spells of different levels from different traditions
Greater Mental Evolution: Adds 1 spell of each level to repertoire
Hag: Casting a bloodline spell inflicts 2 HP mental per spell level (Will neg) to first successful attacker for 1 rd
Imperial: Casting a bloodline spell gives self or target +1 skill checks for 1 rd
Interweave Dispel: (1) May expend a spell slot to add Dispel Magic effects to a successful single-target spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Metamagic Mastery: May use a 1-action metamagic effect as a free action
Occult Evolution: May temporarily add 1 unknown mental spell to repertoire each day
Overwhelming Energy: (1) May cast a spell that ignores resistance 20 to choice of energy
Quickened Casting: (F) May reduce the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action 1/day
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: May have a successful Counterspell inflict the spell effects on the caster
Signature Spells: May freely heighten a chosen spell of each level
Sorcerer Spellcasting: May learn spells from the Occult; Divine; Arcane; Primal tradition
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Undead: Casting a bloodline spell gives self 1 temporary Hit Point per spell level for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP negative per spell level on target for 1 rd
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 10 available vs. 31 allocated
Interweave Dispel Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 14 and dispel magic spell
Sorcerer Bloodline Allocation: 1 available vs. 10 allocated
